page.title: 11VILLAGE SCHOOLS, SALISBURY
page.content: {BRITFORD }has 82 pupils in 3 classes,1 computer,10 rooms, field and playground,2 full_time and 2 part_time teachers. The day runs from 9.00 a.m. to 3.00 p.m. Clubs: 2 recorder, superstars, swimming. Daily assembly.Uniform is optional. Age range 4+ to 11. {ODSTOCK} founded in 1870 by Lord Radnor. 71 pupils in 3 classes. 10 rooms, 1 field,a yard and a computer. 3 full time and 1 part time teacher.Day _ 9.00 a.m. to 3.00 p.m. Clubs are guitar,recorder, dance. Assemblies,uniform,age as Britford. {HARNHAM} Founded 1843 by Church. 197 pupils, 7 teachers,2 computers, swimming pool, hall. clubs and activities as Britford and Odstock.Age range 7_11.
